topic.problem: &\text{Find } f \text{ from the information given. }&\\f'(x)=3-4x, f(1)=6
\text{A coach must choose five starters from a team of 12 players. How many different ways can the coach choose the starters?}
\text{Ten coins are tossed simultaneously. In how many of the outcomes will the third coin turn up a head? }
\text{A man can hit a target once in 4 shots. If he fires 4 shots in succession, what is the probability that he will hit his target? }
\text{In how many ways can the letters of the word "PROBLEM" be rearranged to make seven letter words such that none of the letters repeat? }
\text{In how many ways can the letters of the word ABACUS be rearranged such that the vowels always appear together? }
